channel.title: [317]delta based, adding easter event, how do i make bunny talk+give item?
channel.description:
all i want is easterbunny to say "happy easter" and give a few items. "rubber chicken" and "easter basket"
i have the bunny spawned in a place already he just wont talk.

if you go inside of your client.java and search “Do you have anything to trade” if should come up with the slayer guy.
You could just copy that following code and see what you can do. Gl
